str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To carry, wear, bear constantly. From phoros; to have a burden, i.e. to wear as clothing or a constant accompaniment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An image, likeness, bust. From eiko; a likeness, i.e. statue, profile, or representation, resemblance.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Earthy, made of earth. From choos; dusty or dirty, i.e. terrene.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To carry, wear, bear constantly. From phoros; to have a burden, i.e. to wear as clothing or a constant accompaniment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An image, likeness, bust. From eiko; a likeness, i.e. statue, profile, or representation, resemblance.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From epi and ouranos; above the sky.
